abstract: Memphis Grizzlies fire coach Dave Joerger; other professional basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: A team battered by injuries finished the regular season at 42-40 before being swept in the first round by San Antonio.

headline.main: Grizzlies Fire Coach Dave Joerger in a Surprise Move
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; In Surprise Move, Grizzlies Fire Their Coach

snippet: A team battered by injuries finished the regular season at 42-40 before being swept in the first round by San Antonio.
